abstract: An early snowstorm creates a rare pre-Halloween sight in the Hudson Valley.
snippet: An early snowstorm creates a rare pre-Halloween sight in the Hudson Valley.
lead_paragraph: Here's the view from my front porch of a rare sight in late October in the Hudson Valley: maple foliage that's still green because of a warm September and covered in white flakes from a pre-Halloween snowstorm.

headline.main: October Surprise: White Snow on Green Leaves
